title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 Points

One point is earned for indicating that the magnetic field is along the z axis, or indicating that the right-hand rule applies.

One point is earned for indicating the correct direction along the z axis (e.g. -z, or into the page)
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points.

One point is earned for indicating that the magnetic field is along the z axis, or indicating that the right-hand rule applies.

One point is earned for indicating the correct direction along the z axis (e.g. -z, or into the page)

The student earns one of the following points.

One point is earned for indicating that the magnetic field is along the z axis, or indicating that the right-hand rule applies.

One point is earned for indicating the correct direction along the z axis (e.g. -z, or into the page)

The student earns all of the following points.

One point is earned for indicating that the magnetic field is along the z axis, or indicating that the right-hand rule applies.

One point is earned for indicating the correct direction along the z axis (e.g. -z, or into the page)

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 Points

One point is earned for indicating that the force is along the y axis, or indicating that the right-hand rule applies.

One point is earned for indicating the correct direction along the y axis (e.g. -y down, toward wire)
descriptions:
The Student earns none of the following points.

One point is earned for indicating that the force is along the y axis, or indicating that the right-hand rule applies.

One point is earned for indicating the correct direction along the y axis (e.g. -y down, toward wire)

The student earns one of the following points.

One point is earned for indicating that the force is along the y axis, or indicating that the right-hand rule applies.

One point is earned for indicating the correct direction along the y axis (e.g. -y down, toward wire)

The student earns all of the following points.

One point is earned for indicating that the force is along the y axis, or indicating that the right-hand rule applies.

One point is earned for indicating the correct direction along the y axis (e.g. -y down, toward wire)

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
3 Points

One point is earned for using the appropriate equation for the magnetic force.
F = qvB sinθ

One point is earned for using the appropriate equation for the magnetic field
B = µ0I/2πr or 2k'I/r

One point is earned for the correct answer (which must have the substitutions sin 0 = 1, and r = d)
F = qv0µ0I/2πd or 2k'qv0I/d
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points.

One point is earned for using the appropriate equation for the magnetic force.
F = qvB sinθ

One point is earned for using the appropriate equation for the magnetic field
B = µ0I/2πr or 2k'I/r

One point is earned for the correct answer (which must have the substitutions sin 0 = 1, and r = d)
F = qv0µ0I/2πd or 2k'qv0I/d

The student earns one of the following points.

One point is earned for using the appropriate equation for the magnetic force.
F = qvB sinθ

One point is earned for using the appropriate equation for the magnetic field
B = µ0I/2πr or 2k'I/r

One point is earned for the correct answer (which must have the substitutions sin 0 = 1, and r = d)
F = qv0µ0I/2πd or 2k'qv0I/d

The student earns two of the following points.


One point is earned for using the appropriate equation for the magnetic force.
F = qvB sinθ


One point is earned for using the appropriate equation for the magnetic field
B = µ0I/2πr or 2k'I/r

One point is earned for the correct answer (which must have the substitutions sin 0 = 1, and r = d)
F = qv0µ0I/2πd or 2k'qv0I/d

The student earns all of the following points.


One point is earned for using the appropriate equation for the magnetic force.
F = qvB sinθ


One point is earned for using the appropriate equation for the magnetic field
B = µ0I/2πr or 2k'I/r

One point is earned for the correct answer (which must have the substitutions sin 0 = 1, and r = d)
F = qv0µ0I/2πd or 2k'qv0I/d

title: Part D - 1
stimulusHtml:
1 Point

One point is earned for indicating that the electric field is in the +y direction (e.g up, opposite the magnetic force)
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points.

One point is earned for indicating that the electric field is in the +y direction (e.g up, opposite the magnetic force)

The student earns all of the following points.

One point is earned for indicating that the electric field is in the +y direction (e.g up, opposite the magnetic force)

title: Part D - 2
stimulusHtml:
2 Points

One point is earned for any indication that the electric and magnetic forces are equal and opposite.

FE = FB

qE = qvB
qE = 9v0µ0I/2πd

For the correct answer.
E = v0µ0I / 2πd
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points.

One point is earned for any indication that the electric and magnetic forces are equal and opposite.

FE = FB

qE = qvB
qE = 9v0µ0I/2πd

For the correct answer.
E = v0µ0I / 2πd
